clonewp.with_parent¶

abjad.tools.clonewp.with_parent(ll)¶

Copy list ll of contiguous music from some container.

clonewp.with_parent(t[37 : 39 + 1])

Return in container equal to type of first element in ll. Shrink result container as necessary to preserve parent multiplier.
